provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content: 1. This Act may be cited as the Perjury Act.                                              Short title.

provisions.title: Section 4
provisions.content:
4 . 4 1) Every person who, being lawfully sworn as a witness Pejury
0   or as an interpreter in a judicial proceeding, willfully makes a
    statement material in that proceeding, which he knows to be
    false or does not believe to be true, shall be guilty of the
    misdemeanour of perjury, and on conviction on indictment
    thereof liable to imprisonment with hard labour for any term not
    exceeding seven years, or to a fine, or to both such
    imprisonment and fine.
